summary: In the future, a warrior nun on roller skates must rescue a seer, who is to be sacrificed by a band of mutants.
cast: Kathleen Kinmont|John Damon|Elizabeth Kaitan|Rory Calhoun|Cleve Hall|Sam Mann|Michael Sonye|Johnnie Saiko|Bunny Gibson|Suzanne Solari|Leslie Marcucella|Abby Dalton|Susan Henderson|Mina Sanjo|Norman Alden|Jeff Hutchinson|Marc Siegler|Chris Corso|Robert A. Kline|Erin Michael|Kelsey|Christopher Roth|Greg Miller|Lisa Toothman|Susan Jones|Theresa Bailey
title: Roller Blade Warriors: Taken by Force
